title: Iron arrow

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Iron arrow is an arrow made by combining arrow shafts with feathers, then with iron arrowtips. These can be bought from Lowe's Archery Emporium in Varrock or Hickton's Archery Emporium in Catherby. They can also be obtained from completing the Maze random event.

The Iron arrow is an arrow made by combining arrow shafts with feathers, then with iron arrowtips. These can be bought from Lowe's Archery Emporium in Varrock or Hickton's Archery Emporium in Catherby. They can also be obtained from completing the Maze random event.

Date Changes
22 August 2006
(update)
  • The extra strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Iron arrow(+)" to "Iron arrow(p+)".
  • The super strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Iron arrow(s)" to "Iron arrow(p++)".
